events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The issue was identified as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning they want their money back.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Emily for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you want to return the jacket so we can process your refund efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 834295 and the jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate the refund once you send the jacket back. I will email you the return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I'll look out for the return label and send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We have closed your refund case. Thank you for contacting us, and we hope to serve you better next time.
Please take a moment to complete a short satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
